body_html:
Error on MacOS was a lot larger than on other platforms:

[ RUN      ] NNGradTest.MaxPoolGradHelper
tensorflow/cc/gradients/nn_grad_test.cc:39: Failure
Expected: (max_error) < (2e-4), actual: 0.134928 vs 0.0002

Seems unrelated?

body:
Error on MacOS was a lot larger than on other platforms:

```
[ RUN      ] NNGradTest.MaxPoolGradHelper
tensorflow/cc/gradients/nn_grad_test.cc:39: Failure
Expected: (max_error) < (2e-4), actual: 0.134928 vs 0.0002
```

Seems unrelated?
